mapper.select: SELECT R.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , R.REST_ATTD_CODE , R.REST_TYPE_CODE , R.REST_TYPE_NAME , TO_CHAR(R.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE , R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS , R.COST , R.CAUSE , R.APPLOVAL_STATUS , R.REJECT_CAUSE , R.START_TIME , R.END_TIME FROM REST_ATTD R , EMP E WHERE R.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND R.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE

SELECT R.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, R.REST_ATTD_CODE, R.REST_TYPE_CODE, R.REST_TYPE_NAME, TO_CHAR(R.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE, R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS, R.COST, R.CAUSE, R.APPLOVAL_STATUS, R.REJECT_CAUSE, R.START_TIME, CASE WHEN R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS != 1 AND REST_TYPE_CODE = 'ASC008' THEN R.END_TIME - 2400 ELSE R.END_TIME END AS END_TIME FROM REST_ATTD R, EMP E WHERE R.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND R.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.REST_TYPE_CODE = #{code} AND R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE

SELECT R.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, R.REST_ATTD_CODE, R.REST_TYPE_CODE, R.REST_TYPE_NAME, TO_CHAR(R.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE, R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS, R.COST, R.CAUSE, R.APPLOVAL_STATUS, R.REJECT_CAUSE, R.START_TIME, CASE WHEN R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS != 1 AND REST_TYPE_CODE = 'ASC008' THEN R.END_TIME - 2400 ELSE R.END_TIME END AS END_TIME FROM REST_ATTD R, EMP E WHERE 1=1 AND R.REQUEST_DATE = TO_DATE(#{applyDay} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND E.WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode}

SELECT R.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, R.REST_ATTD_CODE, R.REST_TYPE_CODE, R.REST_TYPE_NAME, TO_CHAR(R.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE, R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS, R.COST, R.CAUSE, R.APPLOVAL_STATUS, R.REJECT_CAUSE, R.START_TIME, CASE WHEN R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS != 1 AND REST_TYPE_CODE = 'ASC008' THEN R.END_TIME - 2400 ELSE R.END_TIME END AS END_TIME FROM REST_ATTD R, EMP E WHERE 1=1 AND E.DEPT_CODE = #{deptName} AND R.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND E.WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode}
